channel.title: We're all making it up as we go along
channel.description: Anyone who thinks that entrepreneurs are all-knowing geniuses that glide serenely from initial idea to successful execution should read this impressively candid article by Elon Musk: http://fortune.com/2016/05/31/elon-musk-confessions-tesla/

item.title: We're all making it up as we go along
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
Anyone who thinks that entrepreneurs are all-knowing geniuses that glide serenely from initial idea to successful execution should read this impressively candid article by Elon Musk:

Fortune

Elon Musk Confessions: All the Stupid Things Tesla Has Done

And the company is still operating like a risky, nimble startup.

Read full topic
item.source: We're all making it up as we go along
